title: checkCitationFile() [E] GetBlobContent: object does not exist [id: cff-version:, rel_path: ]

labels.name: issue/confirmed
labels.description: Issue has been reviewed and confirmed to be present or accepted to be implemented

body:
### Description

When I open a specicif mirror I get this


I can reimport the mirror. But there is a bug.

### Gitea Version

1.21.1

### Can you reproduce the bug on the Gitea demo site?

No

### Log Gist

_No response_
